# Let us take your event from Ordinary to Extraordinary

 Mobile Bartending Services

MIXX Mobile Bar Truck  

Bartenza is Ohio's leading mobile bartending + wait staff service with MIXX
mobile bar truck. Now customizing and renting neon signs! We are committed to
providing that special touch needed to make any event big or small an
unforgettable one. Whether you are planning an upcoming wedding, a special
occasion, corporate event or festival, let us take care of it for you!! ** **  

#### CRAFT COCKTAILS

 **FRESH INGREDIENTS - SEASONALLY INSPIRED - HANDCRAFTED  **

#### CUSTOMIZED DRINK MENUS

 **PERSONALIZED -  CREATIVE - VISUAL  **  

#### MIXX MOBILE BAR TRUCK

 **FUN - MODERN - INNOVATIVE     **

#### ALL OCCASION NEON SIGNS

 **BRIGHT - MEMORABLE - EXCITING   **

#

MIXX MOBILE BAR TRUCK

#### Let us MIXX up your next event!

##### MIXX Is the perfect addition to any event and is sure to impress your
guests while keeping the drinks flowing!  

#####  
Mixx Supplies the truck, staff, and mixers. You supply the booze or we can
have it on the truck by our exclusive beverage company.  

#####  
MIXX can roll up to anywhere to serve fresh cocktails. All drinks are made by
our skillful bartenders and handcrafted on location. We will MIXX up your
party while you sit back and enjoy!  

#####  

#  

##### WHAT KIND OF PARTIES DO YOU CATER?

Any reason to throw a party!  Wedding, Graduation Party, Corporate Event,
Birthday Party, Shower........

  

##### HOW MUCH SPACE DOES MIXX NEED?

I know a girl never likes to talk about her size but ...

Please allow approximately 16' x 8' x 8'

  

##### DOES MIXX COME WITH ALCOHOL?

We serve the supplied booze by the client  or have it delivered from our
exclusive beverage company.   We do offer planning, ordering, and delivery
services.  Drinks will be loaded onto the truck and ready to serve cold by the
start of the event. MIXX is fully loaded with unlimited mixers, ice, cups  

  

##### WHAT KIND OF COCKTAILS?

Honey - you are speaking our language. We love to work with you on signature
cocktails for your event. We have a menu put together with MIXX specialties or
we can put something together to fit your event.  

  

##### WHAT DOES MIXX COME WITH?

We come with a customized chalkboard menu, bar stools, high top bar tables,
speaker for music, bartenders, mixers, ice, cups  

  

## DOES MIXX HAVE POWER?

Yes- MIXX works on electric (220)



##### CAN YOU PULL UP TO ANYWHERE ?

We can pull up close to anywhere or even pull inside buildings  
  

##### HOW FAR DO YOU TRAVEL?

We are based in Cleveland but we are open to travel. We love a good road trip.
Prices are based on events 45 minutes from Cleveland . If it is more than 45
minutes a travel fee would be added onto the package price.

##  

#####  

##### WE LOVE MIXX HOW DO WE BOOK?

Easy Peasy.

Once we have been over details we will send you a contract to review and sign.
You sign contract and send back a 50% deposit to secure the date.  You are
booked with MIXX ... LET THE PARTY BEGIN!  

  

Bartenza

440.376.5610
